name: Standard Satisfaction
scope: Analyze overall satisfaction and NPS across all demographics.

scope: Identify drivers of churn and focus on respondents with low purchase intent.

scope: Focus on geographic differences. Is the North performing better than the West?

scope: Run a full audit of all survey metrics to capture every possible insight.
